    • Method Detail

      • buildUrl

        public static java.lang.String buildUrl(java.lang.String path,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> queryString)
        Builds an url encoded URI from the given path and the query string map.
        Parameters:
        path - URI path without query string
        queryString - the query string map - the values will be url encoded
        Returns:
        a URI composed by the path and query string

      • buildUrl

        public static java.lang.String buildUrl(java.lang.String path,
                                        java.lang.String queryString)
        Builds an url encoded URI from the given path and the query string, of the form: path?foo=1&bar=2.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        queryString - the url encoded query string
        Returns:
        a URI composed by the path and query string

      • buildQueryString

        public static java.lang.String buildQueryString(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> queryString)
        Builds an url encoded query for the given query string map.
        Parameters:
        queryString - the query string map - the values will be url encoded
        Returns:
        a query string with url encoded values
